author: costin
msg: Small fixes and adjustments to build.xml.

author: dims
msg: - added a executeMethod in the AbstractHTTPSender class
- Added a mechanism to reuse HttpClient (Store it in ConfigurationContext)
- Caching of HttpClient is switched *OFF* by default
- Call transport cleanup in generated stub.
- Slight cleanup of commented code and constants

author: slive
msg: Go back to building the site locally, rather than
building it directly into the live site.  The latter
didn't work because the build process deletes everything
right at the start, resulting in a broken site for
some period of time on every rebuild.
I'm going to use rsync to move the files into the
live site (with the checksum option) so that only
changed files will get moved.  This will also produce
accurate last-modified times on the files.

author: jstrachan
msg: moved the SSL tests into the activemq-core

author: jstrachan
msg: moved the SSL transport into the main core module and switched to using our own TCP transport by default (as well as refactoring to make the [Server]SocketFactory objects pluggable
